Title: Border
Writer: John Ajvide Lindqvist (based on the short story "Gräns" by), Ali Abbasi (screenplay), Isabella Eklöf (screenplay), John Ajvide Lindqvist (screenplay)
Actors: Eva Melander, Eero Milonoff, Jörgen Thorsson, Ann Petrén
Plot: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 18 wins & 28 nominations.
